WELCOME.title: Welcome to Catena-X!
WELCOME.content: Welcome to the Catena-X Network. A series of notifications / onboarding steps have been defined to help you get started. Please check your notifications and start configuring your company space within the portal to have a network experience based on your needs.

WELCOME_USE_CASES.title: Browse common Use Cases
WELCOME_USE_CASES.content: We want to make sure you can focus on your preferred use cases, as the network is quite large. Please select the use case you prefer from the table below: .....

WELCOME_SERVICE_PROVIDER.title: Service Providers are waiting for you
WELCOME_SERVICE_PROVIDER.content: If you are in need of a service provider to help you set up your datacenter or an EDC, visit the Service Provider Marketplace.

WELCOME_CONNECTOR_REGISTRATION.title: Register a Connector
WELCOME_CONNECTOR_REGISTRATION.content: You don't have a registered Connector yet. Check out the Connector Offers and register your Connector to participate.

WELCOME_APP_MARKETPLACE.title: Check out the App Marketplace
WELCOME_APP_MARKETPLACE.content: To gain an initial understanding of the available apps, visit the app marketplace.

APP_SUBSCRIPTION_REQUEST.title: App {{app}}: Subscription Request
APP_SUBSCRIPTION_REQUEST.content: A new app subscription request was triggered by {{company}}. Get in contact with {{useremail}} to agree on the app usage and setup guidelines. Once this is done, you will be able to activate the app for {{company}}

APP_SUBSCRIPTION_ACTIVATION.title: Congratulations! - {{offer}} is activated
APP_SUBSCRIPTION_ACTIVATION.content: Congratulations! Your access to your subscribed app {{offer}} has been activated. You are now ready to start using the app. Before accessing the app directly; please got to the user management and assign app roles to the respective users. Only users with an assigned role can access the application.

CONNECTOR_REGISTERED.title: Connector registered successfully
CONNECTOR_REGISTERED.content: The connector {{connector}} was successfully created and you can assign users now.

APP_RELEASE_REQUEST.title: App Release Request - App: {{offer}}
APP_RELEASE_REQUEST.content: {{company}} has created a new app to be published to the Cofinity-X marketplace. Please review the app release request and approve or decline the request.

APP_RELEASE_APPROVAL.title: App request approved
APP_RELEASE_APPROVAL.content: Your request for the app {{app}} was successfully approved. You can now start to assign user permissions via the user management panel.

APP_RELEASE_REJECTION.title: App Release request rejected
APP_RELEASE_REJECTION.content: Your request for app {{offer}} has been rejected. We regret to inform you that your request for an app release has been denied. We take great pride in the quality of our apps and the user experience that they provide. While your app has a lot of potential, it does not currently meet our standards for marketplace release. With the appropriate changes, your app can reach the level of quality that meets our standards. If you need support, please don't hesitate to contact us. We look forward to seeing your app reach its full potential and be released. Sincerely, Cofinity-X.

APP_ROLE_ADDED.title: App {{app}} new Roles added
APP_ROLE_ADDED.content: New user roles have been added for the app {{app}} which you can now assign. New Roles: {{roles}}

TECHNICAL_USER_CREATION.title: {{appName}} subscription created a new technical user
TECHNICAL_USER_CREATION.content: A new technical user has been created

SERVICE_RELEASE_REQUEST.title: Service Release Request - Service: {{offer}}
SERVICE_RELEASE_REQUEST.content: {{company}} created a new service to get published to the Cofinity-X marketplace. Please review the service release request and approve or decline the service release.

SERVICE_RELEASE_APPROVAL.title: Service release request approved
SERVICE_RELEASE_APPROVAL.content: Your release request for service offer {{serviceName}} has been successfully approved and is available on the service marketplace.

SERVICE_RELEASE_REJECTION.title: Service release request rejected
SERVICE_RELEASE_REJECTION.content: Your request for service offer {{serviceName}} has been rejected. Please review your service management board and solve the findings: {{personalMessage}}.

SERVICE_REQUEST.title: Service Subscription Request - Service: {{app}}
SERVICE_REQUEST.content: {{company}} triggered a subscription request for service {{app}}. Validate the request details on the subscription board.

SERVICE_ACTIVATION.title: Service request activated
SERVICE_ACTIVATION.content: Your subscription for service offer {{serviceName}} is now active

ROLE_UPDATE_CORE_OFFER.title: Assigned User Roles Updated - Portal

ROLE_UPDATE_APP_OFFER.title: Assigned User Roles Updated - {{app}}

CREDENTIAL_APPROVAL.title: Verified Credential {{credentialType}} assigned
CREDENTIAL_APPROVAL.content: Verified Credential {{credentialType}} got assigned to your company wallet.

CREDENTIAL_REJECTED.title: Verified Credential {{credentialType}} declined
CREDENTIAL_REJECTED.content: Verified Credential {{credentialType}} got declined. You can start a new request immediately.

SUBSCRIPTION_URL_UPDATE.title: App URL {{app}} updated
SUBSCRIPTION_URL_UPDATE.content:
The app provider has changed the stored App Instance URL for your subscribed app {{app}}.

New URL: {{newUrl}}

deleteModal.title: Delete Notification
deleteModal.intro: Do you want to delete this notification? The deletion is not reversible.

INFO.title: Info notifications
INFO.description: Update of Dataspace Roles and Technical Users

ACTION.title: Action Required
ACTION.description: Action from your side is needed

header.title: Notifications
header.subtitle: Receive updates on Cofinity-X, published apps and services, and changes to your user account, such as newly assigned or revoked roles.
